parameters.title: RealtimeWeatherParams
parameters.description: struct for passing parameters to the method [`realtime_weather`]

lang.description:
Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language.
Visit [request parameter section](https://www.weatherapi.com/docs/#intro-request) to check 'lang-code'.

q.description: Pass US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name. Visit [request parameter section](https://www.weatherapi.com/docs/#intro-request) to learn more.
